snippet: The widow of Yasir Arafat will file a legal complaint in France asking authorities to investigate her husband’s death, about which she has recently raised new suspicions, her lawyer said Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: The widow of Yasir Arafat will file a legal complaint in France asking authorities to investigate her husband’s death, about which she has recently raised new suspicions, her lawyer said Tuesday.

headline.main: France: Widow to Seek Inquiry in Arafat’s Death
headline.print_headline: France: Widow to Seek Inquiry in Arafat’s Death
